overview: Electronica meets erotica when HUSTLER invades the annual Winter Music Conference in Miami's South Beach. Rooftop orgies and sex-filled raves aboune in this porn-soaked carnal exploration of after-hours dance culture. Crack your glow stick and enjoy. DJ Groupie is a sweaty XXX party that bumps till dawn.  The ultimate XXX music video!
title: DJ Groupie
